criteria.name: Relevance
criteria.description: Research directly addresses the problem statement and RFP requirements.

criteria.name: Depth
criteria.description: Research provides substantive insights beyond surface-level information.

criteria.name: Accuracy
criteria.description: Research findings are factually accurate and correctly represent current knowledge.

criteria.name: Comprehensiveness
criteria.description: Research covers all key aspects of the problem domain without major gaps.

criteria.name: Currentness
criteria.description: Research reflects recent developments, trends, and state-of-the-art approaches.

criteria.name: Objectivity
criteria.description: Research presents balanced information without bias toward particular solutions.

criteria.name: Organization
criteria.description: Research is well-structured, logically organized, and easy to follow.

criteria.name: Insightfulness
criteria.description: Research offers meaningful insights that reveal non-obvious implications for solution development.

criteria.name: Source Diversity
criteria.description: Research draws from a diverse range of credible sources and perspectives.

evaluationInstructions: Evaluate the research content against each criterion. For each criterion, provide a score between 0.0 and 1.0, where 0.0 is completely failing to meet the criterion and 1.0 is perfectly meeting it. Provide specific feedback for scores below the pass threshold.
